name: Dengenki Days
storyline:
Juno's rent money has gone missing! There are only a couple of days until the end of the month- the clock is ticking. Juno must use whatever means at her disposal to make as much money as possible if she doesn't want to get kicked out onto the street!

Part slice-of-life comedy and part lighthearted cyberpunk action- Juno and her friends work various odd jobs around the city only to get more than they bargained for.

Sexual escapades, malfunctioning robots, a cat burglar with a penchant for women's underwear- strange events unfold over the course of these enthusiastically electrifying Dengenki Days!
summary: Juno's rent money has gone missing! The end of the month draws near- what is an attractive and spunky girl to do in a situation like this? Join Juno and her friends as they try to earn some quick cash!
